original:
To be used as a vehicle, the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgApparatusOfKw]{apparatus} requires one pilot. While the apparatus’s hatch is closed, the compartment is airtight and watertight. The compartment holds enough air for 10 hours of breathing, divided by the number of breathing creatures inside.

The apparatus floats on water. It can also go underwater to a depth of 900 feet. Below that, the vehicle takes 2d6 Bludgeoning damage each minute from pressure.

A creature in the compartment can take a Utilize action to move as many as two of the apparatus’s levers up or down. After each use, a lever goes back to its neutral position. Each lever, from left to right, functions as shown in the Apparatus of Kwalish Levers table.

Apparatus of Kwalish Levers
LeverUpDown
1Legs extend, allowing the apparatus to walk and swim.Legs retract, reducing the apparatus’s Speed and Swim Speed to 0 and making it unable to benefit from bonuses to speed.
2Forward window shutter opens.Forward window shutter closes.
3Side window shutters open (two per side).Side window shutters close (two per side).
4Two claws extend from the front side of the apparatus.The claws retract.
5Each extended claw makes the following [[/item fmdWz6RQsUCHneZF]]{melee attack}: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (2d6) Bludgeoning damage.Each extended claw makes the following [[/item tgIjCBtGCZvMu8ij]]{melee attack}: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 15).
6The apparatus walks or swims forward provided its legs are extended.The apparatus walks or swims backward provided its legs are extended.
7The apparatus turns 90 degrees counterclockwise provided its legs are extended.The apparatus turns 90 degrees clockwise provided its legs are extended.
8Eyelike fixtures emit Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet.The light turns off.
9The apparatus sinks up to 20 feet if it’s in liquid.The apparatus rises up to 20 feet if it’s in liquid.
10The rear hatch unseals and opens.The rear hatch closes and seals.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgApparatusOfKw]{夸力许装置} 用作载具时需要一名驾驶员。装置舱门闭合期间，舱内属于气密和水密状态。舱内的空气总量可供一名生物呼吸 10 小时，由舱内生物平摊。

此装置可以在水面上漂浮，也可以潜入至多 900 尺深的水底。处于更深水域期间，载具因高压每分钟承受 2d6 钝击伤害。

舱内的生物能够以一个操作动作同时推拉至多两根拉杆。每次操作后，拉杆回归中间档位。从左到右每根拉杆的功能如夸力许装置拉杆表所示：

夸力许装置拉杆
拉杆 上推 下拉
1 展开腿部，使装置可以步行或游泳。 收起腿部，使装置的速度和游泳速度降低至 0 并使装置无法获得任何提升速度的增益。
2 打开前窗。 关闭前窗。
3 打开舱侧百叶窗（每侧两扇）。 关闭舱侧百叶窗（每侧两扇）。
4 展开装置前部的两只钳爪。 收起钳爪。
5 每只钳爪发动如下 [[/item fmdWz6RQsUCHneZF]]{近战攻击}：+8，触及5尺。 命中： 7（2d6）钝击伤害。 每只钳爪发动如下 [[/item tgIjCBtGCZvMu8ij]]{近战攻击}：+8，触及5尺。 命中： 目标陷入受擒状态（逃脱DC15）。
6 若腿部已展开，装置向前步行或游泳。 若腿部已展开，装置向后步行或游泳。
7 若腿部已展开，装置逆时针转 90 度。 若腿部已展开，装置顺时针转 90 度。
8 眼状部件发出半径 30 尺的明亮光照以及额外 30 尺的微光光照。 停止发光。
9 若处于液体中，装置下沉至多 20 尺。 若处于液体中，装置上浮至多 20 尺。
10 解开后部卡扣并打开舱门。 关闭后部卡扣并密封舱门。

original: Each extended claw makes the following melee attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (2d6) Bludgeoning damage.
translation: 每只钳爪发动如下近战攻击：+8，触及 5 尺。命中：7（2d6）钝击伤害。

original: Each extended claw makes the following melee attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: The target has the &Reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 15).
translation: 每只钳爪发动如下近战攻击：+8，触及 5 尺。命中：目标陷入&Reference[Grappled] 状态（逃脱DC 15）。

key: entries->Apparatus of Kwalish->items->Grapple Attack->activities->Grapple Escape Check->name

original: Eyelike fixtures emit Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet.
translation: 眼状部件发出半径 30 尺的明亮光照以及额外 30 尺的微光光照。

original: The avatar can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[DifficultTerrain]. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
translation: 化身可以如穿过 &Reference[DifficultTerrain]一般穿过其他生物和物件，若它在自己回合结束时身处物件内部，则受到 5（1d10）力场伤害。

original: the Avatarends its turn inside an object.
translation: 化身结束时身处物件内部

original:
The avatar makes a number of [[/item .dmgaoiReapingScy]]{Reaping Scythe} attacks equal to half the summoner’s Proficiency Bonus (rounded up).

[[ceil(@prof/2)]]{Number of Attacks}
translation:
化身进行数次 [[/item .dmgaoiReapingScy]]{收割之镰 Reaping Scythe} 攻击，次数等于召唤者熟练加值的一半（向上取整）。

[[ceil(@prof/2)]]{攻击次数}

original: Melee Attack Roll: Automatic hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 ( 1d8 + 3 ) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.
translation:
近战攻击检定：自动命中，触及 5 尺。

命中：7（1d8+3）挥砍伤害外加 4（1d8）暗蚀伤害。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+2，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点穿刺伤害。

original: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.
translation: 该护甲的护胸和护肩由通过油煮硬化的皮子制成。护甲的其余部分则由更软更灵活的材料制作。

original: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.
translation: 斥候依赖听觉或视觉所作的感知（察觉）检定具有优势。

original: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.
translation: 斥候发动两次近战攻击或远程攻击

original:
Melee Weapon Attack:+4 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

The Scout attacks with their Shortsword.

Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

The Scout attacks with their Longbow.

Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.
translation: 板甲由覆盖全身，且相互连接的模铸金属板组成。一套板甲包括护手、重皮靴、一顶附面甲的头盔以及在护甲底层的厚重的布甲。其锁扣和皮带结构可以将护甲重量分配到身体各处。

original:
Melee Weapon Attack:+5 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

The Knight attacks with its Greatsword.

Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

The Knight attacks with its Heavy Crossbow.

For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 ft. of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is incapacitated.
translation: 骑士可在 1 分钟内，对 30 尺内可见的非敌对生物在其进行攻击检定或豁免检定时发出特殊指令或警告。只要该生物能听见并理解骑士，便可在此次检定结果上增加 1d4。同一时间一个生物只能受惠于一颗领导力骰。此效应在骑士陷入失能时终止。

original:
The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee Attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee Attack that would hit it.
The knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
translation: 骑士在进行对抗恐慌状态的豁免检定时具有优势。

original: Made of interlocking metal rings, a chain shirt is worn between layers of clothing or leather. This armor offers modest protection to the wearer's upper body and allows the sound of the rings rubbing against one another to be muffled by outer layers.
translation: 该护甲由互相锁接的金属环组成，通常着装于布衣或皮衣的夹层之间。这种护甲为着装者的上半身提供了适中的保护，且锁环间相互碰撞的声音也可以被外层衣服减弱。

original: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.
translation: 牌通常由木材或金属制成，可以单手进行持用。持用一面盾牌可以令你的护甲等级 +2。不过同一时间里你只能从一面盾牌中受益。

original:
Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

The Guard attacks with its Spear.
translation:
class="line-break">\n

近战或远程武器攻击检定：+3，触及 5 尺或射程20/60尺，单一目标。命中：4（1d6+1）点穿刺伤害，若以双手进行近战攻击则为5（1d8+1）点穿刺伤害。

class="line-break">\n

守卫使用长矛发动攻击。

translation: 该护甲由互相锁接的金属环组成，通常着装于布衣或皮衣的夹层之间。这种护甲为着装者的上半身提供了适中的保护，且锁环间相互碰撞的声音也可以被外层衣服减弱。

original: Made of interlocking metal rings, a chain shirt is worn between layers of clothing or leather. This armor offers modest protection to the wearer's upper body and allows the sound of the rings rubbing against one another to be muffled by outer layers.
translation: 该护甲由互相锁接的金属环组成，通常着装于布衣或皮衣的夹层之间。这种护甲为着装者的上半身提供了适中的保护，且锁环间相互碰撞的声音也可以被外层衣服减弱。

original: A lengthy straight blade designed for slashing foes, the longsword is a highly versatile weapon that may also be wielded with two hands for more punishing strikes.
translation: 长剑是一种多用的武器，一种为切割敌人而设计的武器，当用双手挥舞时将造成更强破坏力。
熊发动两次 [[/item 撕裂]] 攻击。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：5（1d6 + 2）挥砍伤害。

original: The bear makes one [[/item Bite]] attack and one [[/item Claw]] attack.
translation: 熊发动一次 [[/item 啃咬]] 攻击和一次 [[/item 爪击]] 攻击。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：7（1d8 + 3）穿刺伤害。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Slashing damage, and the target has the &Reference[prone] condition if it is Huge or smaller.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：5（1d4 + 3）挥砍伤害，且目标若体型为巨型或更小，则会陷入 &Reference[prone] 状态。

original:
Deadly Hazard (Levels 5–10) or Nuisance Hazard (Levels 11–16)

Brown mold resembles a furry, light-brown carpet. This fungus feeds on warmth, drawing heat from anything around itself. One patch of brown mold covers a 10-foot square, and the temperature within 30 feet of it is always frigid.

When a creature enters a space within 5 feet of the mold for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, the creature makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) Cold damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Brown mold has Immunity to Fire damage, and any source of fire brought within 5 feet of it causes the mold to instantly expand across a surface and toward the fire, creating a new patch that covers a 10-foot square. A patch of brown mold exposed to an effect that deals any amount of Cold damage is destroyed instantly.
translation:
致命危害（等级5-10）或妨碍危害（等级11-16）

棕霉菌长得像一块毛绒绒的、浅棕色的地毯。这种真菌以热量为食，从周围所有的物体中汲取热量。一片棕霉菌覆盖 10 尺方形区域，并且其 30 尺范围内的温度总是寒冷刺骨的。

生物在一回合中首次进入棕霉菌周边 5 尺范围内时，或者在该区域内开始其回合时，该生物必须进行一次 DC 12 的体质豁免，豁免失败时，该生物受22（4d10）的寒冷伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

棕霉菌免疫火焰。任何形式的火焰接近其周边 5 尺范围区域内时，棕霉菌将立即向火焰的方向延伸，创造出一片新的霉菌覆盖前方 10 尺的方形区域。一片棕霉菌受到任何造成寒冷伤害的效果影响时，将会被立即摧毁。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d4 + 2）钝击伤害。

key: entries->Carpet of Flying (3 by 5 ft.)->items->Carry Weight Adjustment->name
entries->Carpet of Flying (3 by 5 ft.)->items->Carry Weight Adjustment->description
original: This item serves to offset the carpet's computed carry weight capacity in accordance with the carpet's dimensions.
translation: 此物品会根据飞毯的尺寸调整其系统计算的负重。

original: The carpet's Fly Speed is halved when carrying more than its normal capacity.
translation: 当飞毯载重超过正常容量时，其飞行速度减半。

key: entries->Carpet of Flying (4 by 6 ft.)->items->Carry Weight Adjustment->name
entries->Carpet of Flying (4 by 6 ft.)->items->Carry Weight Adjustment->description

original: The carpet's Fly Speed is halved when carrying more than its normal capacity.
translation: 当飞毯载重超过正常容量时，其飞行速度减半。

original: The carpet's Fly Speed is halved when carrying more than its normal capacity.
translation: 当飞毯载重超过正常容量时，其飞行速度减半。

entries->Carpet of Flying (6 by 9 ft.)->items->Carry Weight Adjustment->description
original: This item serves to offset the carpet's computed carry weight capacity in accordance with the carpet's dimensions.
translation: 此物品会根据飞毯的尺寸调整其系统计算的负重。

original: The carpet's Fly Speed is halved when carrying more than its normal capacity.
translation: 当飞毯载重超过正常容量时，其飞行速度减半。

original: Bonus Action taken by attuned character
translation: 由已同调角色执行的附赠动作

original: Bonus Action taken by attuned character
translation: 由已同调角色执行的附赠动作

original: Bonus Action taken by attuned character
translation: 由已同调角色执行的附赠动作

original: Bonus Action taken by attuned character
translation: 由已同调角色执行的附赠动作

original: Bonus Action taken by attuned character
translation: 由已同调角色执行的附赠动作

original: The wolf has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.
translation: 狼至少有一个未处于失能的盟友在目标生物 5 尺内时，它对该生物发动的攻击检定有优势。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Piercing damage, and the target has the &Reference[prone] condition if it is Huge or smaller.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：8（1d10 + 3）穿刺伤害，且目标若体型为巨型或更小，则会 &Reference[prone] 状态。
象发动两次 [[/item 顶撞]] 攻击。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) Piercing damage. If the elephant moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target also has the &Reference[prone] condition.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+8，触及 5 尺。命中：15（2d8 + 6）穿刺伤害。如果大象在击中目标前至少直线移动了 20 尺，目标陷入&Reference[prone] 状态。

original: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature within 5 feet that has the Prone condition. Failure: 17 (2d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. Success: Half damage.
translation: 敏捷豁免： DC 16，单一 5 尺内且处于倒地状态的生物。失败： 造成 17（2d10 + 6）钝击伤害。成功： 半伤。

original:
Deadly Hazard (Levels 5–10)

A fireball fungus is a Small, inanimate mushroom that can grow anywhere fungi are found in abundance. Its luminous, orange cap sheds Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 15 feet.

A fireball fungus has AC 10, HP 6, and to Immunity Psychic damage. When it drops to 0 Hit Points, the fungus explodes as if a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} spell (save DC 15) had been centered on it.

At Higher Levels. The explosion of a fireball fungus causes other fireball fungi in the area of effect to explode as well. You can scale the hazard for higher levels by adding one additional fungus at levels 11–16 or three additional fungi at levels 17–20.
translation:
致命危害（等级5-10）

火球菇是一种小型的、不会活动的菌菇，可以在任何真菌繁盛的地方生长。其发光的橙色菌盖为 15 尺半径范围内提供明 亮光照，并在额外的 15 尺范围内提供微光光照。

一株火球菇拥有AC10，6点生命值，并且对心灵伤害具有免疫。当火球菇生命值降至0点时，火球菇将爆炸，效果如同一道以其为源点施展的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]（豁免DC15）。

针对更高等级。 一株火球菇的爆炸将会使其爆炸范围内的其余火球菇也一并爆炸。你可以通过额外添加一株火球菇，来将危害对应等级范围提高到11-16级 ，增加三株火球菇可以将等级范围提高到17-20级。

original: The frog can breathe air and water.
translation: 青蛙可以在空气和水中呼吸。

original: The frog’s Long Jump is up to 10 feet and its High Jump is up to 5 feet with or without a running start.
translation: 青蛙无需助跑即可跳远至多 10 尺或跳高至高 5 尺。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+3，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点穿刺伤害。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) Piercing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+3，触及 5 尺。命中：6（2d4 + 1）穿刺伤害。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the goat moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) Bludgeoning damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, has the &Reference[prone] condition.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：6（1d6 + 3）钝击伤害。如果山羊在命中目标前至少直线移动了 20 尺，目标会额外承受 5（2d4）钝击伤害，并且如果目标体型为巨型或更小，会陷入 &Reference[prone] 状态。

original: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
translation: 蜘蛛能够在困难表面上攀爬，包括倒吊在天花板上，而不需要进行属性检定。

original: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and it knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
translation: 蜘蛛在蛛网上移动时无视蛛网造成的移动限制，且与蛛网接触时，蜘蛛可以知道其他与该蛛网接触生物的准确位置。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：穿刺伤害 7（1d8 + 3）+ 毒素伤害 7（2d6）。

original: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature the spider can see within 60 feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[restrained] condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage).
translation: 敏捷豁免：DC 13，单一 60 尺内蜘蛛可见的生物。失败：目标陷入&Reference[restrained] 状态直至蛛网被摧毁（AC 10；HP 5；火焰易伤；免疫毒素与心灵伤害）。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：5（1d4 + 3）穿刺伤害。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Bludgeoning damage, or the goat deals 2 (1d4) Bludgeoning damage if it moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+2，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点钝击伤害，或者如果山羊在击中目标前至少直线移动了 20 尺，造成 2（1d4）点钝击伤害。

original: Removing a horn requires a Magic action, and the weapons disappear and the horns return when the goat reverts to figurine form.
translation: 你可以以一个魔法动作卸下羊角，当山羊变回雕像时，角变成的武器也将随之消失，而山羊的角会恢复原状。

original: Removing a horn requires a Magic action, and the weapons disappear and the horns return when the goat reverts to figurine form.
translation: 你可以以一个魔法动作卸下羊角，当山羊变回雕像时，角变成的武器也将随之消失，而山羊的角会恢复原状。

original: While you ride the goat, any Hostile creature that starts its turn within a 30-foot Emanation originating from the goat must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for 1 minute, until you are no longer riding the goat, or until the goat reverts to figurine form. The Frightened creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the save, a creature is immune to this effect for the next 24 hours.
translation: 当你骑乘这头巨山羊时，它将散发出 30 尺半径的光环，任何在光环范围内开始其回合的敌对生物都必须进行一次DC 15 的感知豁免，豁免失败则陷入&Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态 1 分钟，当你不再骑乘山羊、或是山羊变回雕像后该恐慌也会提前结束。该受恐慌生物可以在它的每个回合结束时再次进行该豁免，成功则终止其身上的该效应。生物豁免成功时，它将在随后的 24 小时里免疫该效应。

original: Hostile creature starts its turn within 30 feet
translation: 任何在光环范围内开始其回合的敌对生物

original: The &Reference[Frightened apply=false] creature repeats the [[/save ability=wis dc=15]]{save} at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
translation: 该受 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 生物可以在它的每个回合结束时再次进行该 [[/save ability=wis dc=15]]{豁免}，成功则终止其身上的该效应。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：7（1d8 + 3）钝击伤害。

original:
Nuisance Hazard (Levels 1–4)

Acidic green slime devours flesh, organic material, and metal on contact. Bright green, wet, and sticky, it clings to walls, floors, and ceilings in patches.

One patch of green slime covers a 5-foot square. Green slime has Blindsight with a range of 30 feet, and it drops from walls and ceilings when it detects movement below itself. Beyond that, it can’t move. A creature aware of the slime’s presence can avoid being struck by it with a successful DC 10 Dexterity saving throw.

A creature that comes in contact with green slime takes 5 (1d10) Acid damage. The creature takes the damage again at the start of each of its turns until the slime is scraped off (requiring an action) or destroyed. Against wood or metal, green slime deals 11 (2d10) Acid damage each round, and any nonmagical wood or metal item used to scrape off the green slime is destroyed.

Direct sunlight or any amount of Cold, Fire, or Radiant damage destroys a patch of green slime.
translation:
妨碍危害（等级1-4）

这种酸性的绿色软泥会吞噬接触到的血肉、有机物和金属。它呈现明绿色，黏滑潮湿，成片地附着在墙壁、地板以及天花板上。

一片绿软泥覆盖 5 尺方形区域，其拥有 30 尺范围的盲视感官，当检测到其下有移动物体时，绿软泥将从天花板或墙壁上掉落。除此之外，绿软泥不具有任何活动能力。注意到绿软泥存在的生物可以成功通过一次DC 10 的敏捷豁免来避免被其击中。

与绿软泥接触的生物会受到5（1d10）点强酸伤害。该生物在每个自己的回合开始时再次受到该伤害，直至将软泥摧毁或将其从身上刮除（需要一个动作）。绿软泥对木材和金属造成每轮11（2d10）点强酸伤害，并且任何用于刮除软泥的木质或金属质非魔法物品都将被摧毁。

阳光直射或者任何寒冷、火焰或光耀伤害都将立刻摧毁一块绿软泥。

original: Magical Darkness doesn’t impede the imp’s Darkvision.
translation: 魔法黑暗不会影响小魔鬼的黑暗视觉。

original: The imp has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
translation: 小魔鬼对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 6（1d6 + 3）穿刺伤害外加 7（2d6）毒素伤害。

original:
The imp casts [[/item oHafKbzbqYGiL4i1]] on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

@Embed[.oHafKbzbqYGiL4i1 caption=false]
translation:
小魔鬼对自身施展 [[/item oHafKbzbqYGiL4i1]] ，无需任何法术成分并使用魅力作为施法属性。

@Embed[.oHafKbzbqYGiL4i1 caption=false]

original: The imp shape-shifts to resemble a rat (Speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., Fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., Climb 20 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed. Any equipment it’s wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.
translation: 小魔鬼变形为一只老鼠（速度 20 尺）、渡鸦（20 尺，飞行 60 尺）或蜘蛛（20 尺，攀爬 20 尺）的形象，或是变回其真实形态。除速度外，其各形态下的数据皆相同。它携带或着装的任何装备都不会随之变化。

original: A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.
translation: 你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

original: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.
translation: 如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

original:
Deadly Hazard (Levels 5–10) or Nuisance Hazard (Levels 11–16)

Whenever an uncontrolled fire spreads, it can create an inferno that quickly engulfs creatures, objects, and vegetation.

An inferno consists of at least four contiguous 10-foot Cubes of fire. Each of the inferno’s 10-foot Cubes can be doused with 10 gallons of water. Exposure to a strong wind for 1 minute causes the inferno to grow, adding [[/r 1d4]] new 10-foot Cubes to its volume. An inferno deprived of fuel burns itself out after 1d10 minutes.

An inferno damages any vegetation or object that isn’t being worn or carried that it touches, dealing 22 (4d10) Fire damage immediately and again at the end of each minute. Any creature that enters the inferno for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 22 (4d10) Fire damage and is burning.
translation:
致命危害（等级5-10）或妨碍危害（等级11-16）

当火焰不受控制地蔓延时，就能制造出一片燎原烈火，迅速地吞噬生物、物件和植物。

一片燎原烈火由至少四个 10 尺立方的火焰相连组成。每 10 尺立方的火焰可以被 10 加仑的水扑灭。暴露在一阵强风中 1 分钟后，燎原烈火会扩张，额外增加 1d4 个 10 尺立方的火焰。一片失去燃料的燎原烈火将在 1d10 分钟后燃尽。

燎原烈火会立即对任何它接触到的，未被穿戴的植物或物件造成22（4d10）点火焰伤害，并且 每一分钟会再次造成该伤害。生物在一回合内首次进入燎原烈火范围内，或者在范围内开始其回合时，将受到22（4d10）点火焰伤害，并开始燃烧。

original: The lion has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.
translation: 若狮子的攻击目标生物周围 5 尺范围内存在有至少一个狮子未失能的盟友，则狮子对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

original: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can Long Jump up to 25 feet.
translation: 狮子在助跑 10 尺后可以跳远至多 25 尺。

original: The lion makes two [[/item Rend]] attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with a use of [[/item Roar]].
translation: 狮子发动两次 [[/item 撕裂]] 攻击。它可以将其中一次攻击替换为使用 [[/item 咆哮]]。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：7（1d8 + 3）挥砍伤害。

original: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 11, one creature within 15 feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the lion’s next turn.
translation: 感知豁免：DC 11，单一 15 尺内的生物。失败：目标陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态，持续直至狮子的下一回合开始。

original: The target has the &Reference[frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the lion’s next turn.
translation: 你陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态，持续直至狮子的下一回合开始。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Piercing damage, and the target has the &Reference[prone] condition if it is Large or smaller.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+3，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d6 + 1）穿刺伤害，且目标若体型为大或更小则陷入 &Reference[prone apply=false] 状态。

original: The mule counts as one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.
translation: 在决定骡的载重能力时，其被视为更大一级的体型。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d4 + 2）钝击伤害。

original: The panther makes one [[/item Pounce]] attack and uses [[/item Prowl]].
translation: 黑豹发动一次 [[/item 猛扑]] 攻击，并使用 [[/item 潜行]]。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage, or the panther deals 7 (2d4 + 2) Slashing damage if it had Advantage on the attack roll.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+4，攻击范围 5 尺。命中：4（1d4 + 2）挥砍伤害，若黑豹在攻击检定中具有优势，则造成 7（2d4 + 2）挥砍伤害。

original: The panther moves up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. At the end of this movement, the panther can take the &Reference[hide] action.
translation: 黑豹可移动达其移动速度的一半且不会引发机会攻击。在移动结束时，黑豹可以采取&Reference[hide] 动作。

original:
Nuisance Hazard (Levels 1–4)

Poisonous gas is usually encountered in an enclosed space, such as a sewer or sealed tomb. The gas fills as much space as it can, up to a maximum of ten 10-foot Cubes. The transparent gas carries a foul odor. The gas is continuously or periodically replenished by some natural or magical source, though a strong wind disperses the gas for 1 minute.

Any creature that enters poisonous gas for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 5 (1d10) Poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures in the gas also have Disadvantage on Death Saving Throws.

At Higher Levels. You can scale the hazard for higher levels by increasing the Poison damage and the save DC, as shown in the following table.

Levels

Poison Damage

Save DC

5–10

11 (2d10)

14

11–16

22 (4d10)

16

17–20

55 (10d10)

18
translation:
妨碍危害（等级1-4）

毒气常见于封闭空间内，如下水道或者封闭的墓穴中。毒气会尽可能地填满空间，最大覆盖范围为十个 10 尺立方。这种透明的气体带有腐臭味，它会持续地或者周期性地由其天然源头或魔法源头补充，但一阵强风能将毒气驱散长达一分钟，

任何在一回合内首次进入毒气范围、或者在范围内开始其回合的生物，必须进行一次DC 12 的体 质豁免，豁免失败受到5（1d10）点毒素伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。身处毒气中的生物还会在死亡豁免中具有劣势。

针对更高等级。 你可以通过提高毒素伤害及其豁免DC来提高毒气对应的等级范围，如以下表格所示。

等级范围

毒素伤害

豁免 DC

5–10

11 (2d10)

14

11–16

22 (4d10)

16

17–20

55 (10d10)

18

original:
Nuisance Hazard (Levels 1–4)

A quicksand pit is 10 feet deep and covers the ground in a 10-foot square. A creature that enters the area sinks [[/r 1d4 + 1]] feet into the quicksand and has the &Reference[Restrained] condition. At the start of each of the creature’s turns, it sinks another [[/r 1d4]] feet. As long as the creature isn’t completely submerged in quicksand, it can take an action to try to escape, doing so with a successful Strength (Athletics) check (DC 10 plus the number of feet the creature has sunk into the quicksand). A creature that is completely submerged in quicksand has &Reference[Total Cover] and the &Reference[Blinded] condition and risks suffocation.

A creature can pull another creature within its reach out of a quicksand pit by taking an action and succeeding on a Strength (Athletics) check (DC 5 plus the number of feet the creature has sunk into the quicksand).

At Higher Levels. You can scale this hazard for higher levels by making the pit deeper and increasing the number of feet a creature sinks at the start of each of its turns, as shown in the following table.

Levels

Pit Depth

Sinking Rate

5–10

15 feet

[[/r 1d6]] feet

11–16

20 feet

[[/r 1d8]] feet

17–20

30 feet

[[/r 1d10]] feet

Foundry Note

The Escape Check and Pull Another Creature Out activities allows you to enter the number of feet the creature has sunk and will increase the DC automatically.
translation:
妨碍危害（等级1-4）

一处流沙陷坑有 10 尺深，覆盖 10 尺方形范围的地面。进入区域的生物会在流沙内下陷 [[/r 1d4 + 1]] 尺，并陷入 &Reference[Restrained] 状态。在该生物每回合开始时，将再次下陷 [[/r 1d4]] 尺。只要生物没有完全被流沙吞没，它就能用一个动作尝试逃脱，进行一次力量（运动）检定（DC为10 加上生物陷入流沙的英尺数），检定成功则脱困。完全被流沙吞没的生物将陷入 &Reference[Total Cover] 和 &Reference[Blinded] 状态，并有窒息的风险。

生物可以将其触及内的另一位生物拉出流沙陷坑，这需要救援者用其动作进行一次成功的运动（力量）检定（DC为 5 加上生物陷入流沙的英尺数）。

针对更高等级。 你可以通过加深陷坑深度和提高每回合生物下陷的英尺数来提高对应的等级范围，如以下表格所示。

等级范围

陷坑深度

下陷速度

5–10

15 尺

[[/r 1d6]] 尺

11–16

20 尺

[[/r 1d8]] 尺

17–20

30 尺

[[/r 1d10]] 尺

Foundry Note

逃脱检定和拉出另一生物行动允许你输入生物下沉的英尺数，系统会自动提高难度等级。

original: The rat doesn’t provoke Opportunity Attacks when it moves out of an enemy’s reach.
translation: 老鼠移动离开敌人的触及时不会引发借机攻击。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+2，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点穿刺伤害。

original: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a whisper or chitter. A hearer can discern the sounds are imitations with a successful [[/check skill=ins dc=10]] check.
translation: 渡鸦可以模仿曾听过的简单声音，如低语声或鸟鸣声。听到该声音的生物可以进行一次[[/check skill=ins dc=10]] 检定，检定成功则发现其是模仿。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.
translation:
近战攻击检定：+4，攻击范围 5 尺。

命中：造成 1 点穿刺伤害。

original:
Nuisance Hazard (Levels 1–4)

Razorvine is a plant that grows in wild tangles and hedges. It also clings to the sides of buildings and other surfaces as ivy does. A 10-foot-high, 10-foot-wide, 5-foot-thick wall or hedge of razorvine has AC 11; HP 25; and Immunity to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Psychic damage.

When a creature comes into contact with razorvine for the first time on a turn, the creature must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 5 (1d10) Slashing damage from the bladelike thorns.
translation:
妨碍危害（等级1-4）

利刃藤是一种生长在野外丛林和灌木丛中的植物。它还可以像常春藤一样，附着在建筑物和其它表面上。一块 10 尺高，10 尺宽，5 尺厚的利刃藤墙或利刃藤篱笆拥有AC 11，25 点生命值，对钝击、穿刺和心灵伤害具有免疫。

生物在一回合内第一次接触利刃藤时，该生物必须成功通过一次DC 10 的敏捷豁免，否则将被其刀锋般的荆棘划伤而受到5（1d10）点挥砍伤害。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：7（1d8 + 3）钝击伤害。

original:
Nuisance Hazard (Levels 11–16)

The River Styx courses through the Lower Planes. Tasting or touching its waters can shatter a creature’s intellect and personality, as well as strip away its memories. Certain Fiends are immune to the river’s effects.

Unless immune to the river’s effects, a creature that drinks from the Styx, enters the river, or starts its turn in the river makes a DC 20 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 19 (3d12) Psychic damage and can’t cast spells or take the Magic action for 30 days. An affected creature can drink from the Styx and swim in its waters without suffering any additional effects.

The effect can be ended only by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{Heal}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell. If the effect isn’t ended after 30 days, the effect becomes permanent, and the creature loses all its memories. At that point, nothing short of a Wish spell or divine intervention can undo the effect.

Water taken from the River Styx loses its potency after 24 hours, becoming a harmless, foul-tasting liquid. Arcanaloths, night hags, and other fell creatures might know rituals that can prolong the water's potency, at your discretion.
translation:
妨碍危害（等级11-16）

冥河流经下层位面。品尝或接触其河水将摧毁生物的理智和个性，同时剥夺其记忆。某些邪魔免疫冥河的效果。

从冥河中饮水、走入河水或在河水中开始其回合的生物必须进行一次DC20的智力豁免，除非该生物免疫冥河的效果。豁免失败时，生物受到 19（3d12）点心灵伤害，并且在接下来的30天内无法施放法术或执行魔法动作。已经受到冥河效果影响的生物可以自由饮用河水或在河水中游泳，不会受到额外的影响。

这一效应只能被 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeal000000], 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000] 所终止。如果此效应在 30 天内没有被终止，它将转化为永久效应，受影响的生物则会失去所有记忆。到了这种程度后，只有 祈愿术 和神圣干预才能将其解除。

从冥河中取出的水，在 24 小时后会失去其效力，成为无害的、有腐烂味道的液体。奥登罗斯魔，夜鬼婆和其它邪恶生物可能知晓延长冥河水效力的仪式，这由你决定。

original:
The creature can’t cast spells or take the Magic action for 30 days. An affected creature can drink from the Styx and swim in its waters without suffering any additional effects.

The effect can be ended only by the Greater Restoration, Heal, or Wish spell. If the effect isn’t ended after 30 days, the effect becomes permanent, and the creature loses all its memories. At that point, nothing short of a Wish spell or divine intervention can undo the effect.
translation:
生物在接下来的 30 天内无法施放法术或执行魔法动作。已经受到冥河效果影响的生物可以自由饮用河水或在河水中游泳，不会受到额外的影响。

这一效应只能被 高等复原术, 医疗术, 或 祈愿术所终止。如果此效应在 30 天内没有被终止，它将转化为永久效应，受影响的生物则会失去所有记忆。到了这种程度后，只有 祈愿术 和神圣干预才能将其解除。

original:
Deadly Hazard (Levels 1–4)

When a rockslide occurs, every creature in its path makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 11 (2d10) Bludgeoning damage, has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition, and moves with the rockslide. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

When the rockslide stops, its space becomes &Reference[Difficult Terrain], and all Prone creatures in its space are buried under rocks and debris. A creature buried in this way has the &Reference[Restrained] condition and has &Reference[Total Cover]. As an action, a creature can try to crawl out from under the rock pile. If the creature succeeds on a DC 15 Strength (Athletics) check, it is no longer Restrained; instead, it has the Prone condition and is atop the rock pile. If the check fails, the creature remains buried and gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion] level.

A creature that has neither the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] nor the Restrained condition can spend 1 minute freeing another creature buried by the rockslide.

At Higher Levels. You can scale this hazard for higher levels by increasing the Bludgeoning damage as follows: 22 (4d10) at levels 5–10, 55 (10d10) at levels 11–16, and 99 (18d10) at levels 17–20.
translation:
妨碍危害（等级1-4）

当岩崩发生时，每个处于其路径上的生物必须进行一次DC15的敏捷豁免。豁免失败时，生物受到11（2d10）点钝击伤害 ，并且陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态，随着岩崩移动。豁免成功则生物仅受半伤。

当岩崩停下后，其占据空间变为 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]，所有倒地于其中的生物都会被石头和碎片所掩埋。以此法被掩埋其中的生物陷入 &Reference[Restrained] 状态，并获得 &Reference[Total Cover]。以一个动作，生物可以尝试从石堆中爬出来：如果该生物成功通过一次DC15的力量（运动）检定，它将不再被束缚，而是来到石堆的表面，同时陷入倒地状态；如果检定失败，该生物依旧被掩埋，且获得1级 &Reference[Exhaustion]。

一个没有处于 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 和束缚状态的生物可以花费一分钟，救出被岩崩掩埋的另一个生物。

针对更高等级。 你可以通过提高钝击伤害来提高这一危害所对应的等级范围，按照如此：5-10 级范围受到22（4d10）点伤害，11-16 级范围受到55（10d10）点伤害，17-20 级范围受到99（18d10）点伤害。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：6（1d6 + 3）穿刺伤害。

original: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 80/320 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.
translation: 远程攻击检定：+5，射程 80/320 尺。命中：6（1d6 + 3）穿刺伤害。

original: The tiger makes one [[/item Pounce]] attack and uses [[/item Prowl]].
translation: 虎发动一次 [[/item 猛扑]] 攻击，并使用 [[/item 潜行]]。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage. If the tiger had Advantage on the attack roll, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) Slashing damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, has the &Reference[prone] condition.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：6（1d6 + 3）挥砍伤害。若虎在攻击检定上有优势，目标会额外承受 3（1d6）挥砍伤害，且若目标体型为巨型或更小，则会陷入 &Reference[prone] 状态。

original: The tiger moves up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. At the end of this movement, the tiger can take the &Reference[hide] action.
translation: 虎可移动达其移动速度的一半且不会引发机会攻击。在移动结束时，虎可以采取&Reference[hide] 动作。

original:
Nuisance Hazard (Levels 1–4)

Vicious vines are animated by magic. They often cling to doorways, archways, walls, and statuary. Until a vicious vine moves, there’s nothing to distinguish it from an inanimate vine.

Each vicious vine has AC 11; HP 16; and to Immunity Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Psychic damage. When a creature enters a space within 5 feet of the vine for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, the vine tries to coil around that creature. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or have the Grappled condition (escape DC 12). While Grappled in this way, the target takes 5 (1d10) Necrotic damage from the vine’s life-draining thorns at the start of each of the target’s turns. The vine can grapple only one creature at a time.

As an Influence action, a character under the effect of a Speak with Plants spell or similar magic can try to persuade the vine to release its victim, doing so with a successful DC 10 Charisma (Persuasion) check. A creature released by the vine in this way won’t be attacked by that vine again for the next 24 hours.

At Higher Levels. You can scale the hazard for higher levels by increasing the Necrotic damage, the save DC, and the escape DC, as shown in the following table.

Levels

Necrotic Damage

Save/Escape DC

5–10

11 (2d10)

14

11–16

22 (4d10)

16

17–20

55 (10d10)

18
translation:
妨碍危害（等级1-4）

恶毒活藤由魔法活化，它们常常附着在门框、拱门、墙壁和雕像上。除非恶毒活藤移动，否则没有办法将其与非活化的 藤蔓区分开来。

每条恶毒活藤拥有AC 11，16 点生命值，并对钝击、穿刺和心灵伤害具有免疫。当一个生物一回合内第一次进入藤蔓5尺范围内，或在范围内开始其回合时，藤蔓将会尝试缠绕住 此生物。目标必须成功通过一次DC 12 的敏捷豁免，否则将陷入受擒状态（逃脱DC 12）。以此法陷入受擒状态的生物在自己的回合开始时，藤蔓上的荆棘会吸取其生命力，对其造成5（1d10）点暗蚀伤害。一条藤蔓同时只 能擒抱一个生物。

以一个影响动作，处于 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithP] 或者类似法术效应下的角色可以说服藤蔓释放受害者，这需要成功通过一次DC 10 的魅力（游说）检定。一个被藤蔓主动释放的生物在接下来的24小时内不会被这根藤蔓再次攻击。

针对更高等级。 你可以通过提高黯蚀伤害、豁免DC和逃脱DC来提高危害对应的等级范围，如以下表格所示。

等级范围

黯蚀伤害

豁免/逃脱DC

5–10

11 (2d10)

14

11–16

22 (4d10)

16

17–20

55 (10d10)

18

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点穿刺伤害。

original:
Nuisance Hazard (Levels 1–4)

Giant spiders weave thick, sticky webs across passages and at the bottom of pits to snare prey. These web-filled areas are &Reference[Difficult Terrain].

A creature that enters a web-filled area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or have the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. As an action, a creature Restrained by the webs can try to escape from them, doing so with a successful DC 12 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check.

Each 10-foot Cube of webs has AC 10; HP 15; Vulnerability to Fire damage; and Immunity to Piercing, Poison, and Psychic damage.
translation:
妨碍危害（等级1-4）

巨蜘蛛会在过道和陷坑底部编织厚实黏滑的蛛网用以捕猎。这些布满蛛网的区域皆视为 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]。

在每个回合内首次进入蛛网覆盖区域内，或者在区域内开始自己的回合的生物需要成功通过一次DC 12 的敏捷豁免，否则 将陷入束缚状态。以一个动作，一个被蛛网束缚的生物可以尝试从蛛网上逃脱，这需要成功通过一次DC 12 的力量（运动）或敏捷（特技）检定。

每 10 尺立方的蛛网拥有AC 10，15 点生命值，蛛网对火焰伤害具有易伤，而对穿刺、毒素和心灵伤害具有免疫。

original: The wolf has Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.
translation: 狼至少有一个未处于失能的盟友在目标生物 5 尺内时，它对该生物发动的攻击检定有优势。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage, and the target has the &Reference[prone] condition if it is Medium or smaller.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：5（1d6 + 2）穿刺伤害， 且目标若体型为巨型或更小，则会陷入 &Reference[prone] 状态。

original:
Deadly Hazard (Levels 1–4) or Nuisance Hazard (Levels 5–10)

Yellow mold grows in dark places, and one patch covers a 5-foot square. If touched, the mold ejects a cloud of spores that fills a 10-foot Cube. Any creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) Poison damage and have the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 minute. While Poisoned in this way, the creature takes 5 (1d10) Poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Direct sunlight or any amount of Fire damage destroys a patch of yellow mold.
translation:
致命危害（等级1-4）或妨碍危害（等级5-10）

黄霉菌生在阴暗处，每片黄霉菌覆盖5尺方形区域如果被触碰，黄霉菌会喷射出一片覆盖 10 尺立方区域的孢子云。任何处于此区域内的生物必须成功通过一次DC 15 的体质豁免，否则将受到 11（2d10）点毒素伤害，并在接下来的一分钟内陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false]状态。以此法中毒的生物在其每个回合开始时受到5（1d10）点毒素伤害。生物在每个自己的回合结束时重新豁免，豁免成功则效应终止。

阳光直射或任何火焰伤害都会立刻摧毁一片黄霉菌。

original: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 Hit Points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 plus the damage taken unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the zombie drops to 1 Hit Point instead.
translation: 当僵尸因受非光耀非重击伤害而使其生命值减至 0 时，它必须进行一次 DC 为 5＋所受伤害值的体质豁免，豁免成功则生命值降至 1。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Bludgeoning damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定： +3，触及五尺。 命中： 4 (1d6 + 1) 点钝击伤害。
